Python Code python
import os import requests import json from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import time import re # Ensure urllib.parse import works correctly try: from urllib.parse import quote, urlencode print("Successfully imported urllib.parse functions") except ImportError as e: print(f"Import error: {e}") # Fallback manual quote function def quote(s): return s.replace(' ', '%20').replace('&', '%26') # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) print("Searching for information about Telemundo's 2006 television expansion project in Mexico...") print("Focus: Partnership with Mexico City-based company, broadband license, Grupo Medcom, Noticiero Telemundo Internacional") print("="*80) def make_safe_request(url, headers=None, timeout=15, max_retries=2): """Make HTTP request with error handling and retries""" if headers is None: headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36', 'Accept': 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8', 'Accept-Language': 'en-US,en;q=0.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Connection': 'keep-alive' } for attempt in range(max_retries): try: print(f" Attempting request to: {url[:100]}{'...' if len(url) > 100 else ''}") response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=timeout) print(f" Response status: {response.status_code}") if response.status_code == 200: return response elif response.status_code == 429: print(f" Rate limited, waiting {(attempt + 1) * 3} seconds...") time.sleep((attempt + 1) * 3) else: print(f" HTTP {response.status_code}: {response.reason}") except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e: print(f" Request error on attempt {attempt + 1}: {str(e)[:100]}") if attempt < max_retries - 1: time.sleep(2 ** attempt) return None def search_duckduckgo(query, max_results=10): """Search using DuckDuckGo as alternative to Google""" print(f"\nSearching DuckDuckGo for: {query}") # DuckDuckGo HTML search search_url = f"https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q={quote(query)}" response = make_safe_request(search_url) results = [] if response: soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') # Extract search results from DuckDuckGo search_results = soup.find_all('div', class_='result') for result in search_results[:max_results]: title_elem = result.find('a', class_='result__a') snippet_elem = result.find('a', class_='result__snippet') if title_elem: title = title_elem.get_text(strip=True) link = title_elem.get('href', '') snippet = snippet_elem.get_text(strip=True) if snippet_elem else 'No snippet available' results.append({ 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'source': 'DuckDuckGo' }) print(f" Found: {title[:80]}{'...' if len(title) > 80 else ''}") print(f" Total results found: {len(results)}") return results def search_bing(query, max_results=10): """Search using Bing as another alternative""" print(f"\nSearching Bing for: {query}") # Bing search URL search_url = f"https://www.bing.com/search?q={quote(query)}&count={max_results}" response = make_safe_request(search_url) results = [] if response: soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') # Extract search results from Bing search_results = soup.find_all('li', class_='b_algo') for result in search_results[:max_results]: title_elem = result.find('h2') link_elem = result.find('a') snippet_elem = result.find('p') or result.find('div', class_='b_caption') if title_elem and link_elem: title = title_elem.get_text(strip=True) link = link_elem.get('href', '') snippet = snippet_elem.get_text(strip=True) if snippet_elem else 'No snippet available' results.append({ 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'source': 'Bing' }) print(f" Found: {title[:80]}{'...' if len(title) > 80 else ''}") print(f" Total results found: {len(results)}") return results def extract_relevant_content(text, keywords): """Extract sentences containing relevant keywords""" if not text or not isinstance(text, str): return [] relevant_sentences = [] # Split into sentences sentences = re.split(r'[.!?]+', text) for sentence in sentences: sentence = sentence.strip() if len(sentence) > 10: # Skip very short fragments # Check if sentence contains any of our keywords sentence_lower = sentence.lower() if any(keyword.lower() in sentence_lower for keyword in keywords): relevant_sentences.append(sentence) return relevant_sentences def analyze_for_companies(text): """Extract potential company names from text""" companies = set() if not text: return list(companies) # Patterns for company names patterns = [ r'\bGrupo\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\b', # Grupo + name r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\s+S\.A\.\b', # Company S.A. r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\s+Corporation\b', # Corporation r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\s+Corp\b', # Corp r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\s+Media\b', # Media companies r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\s+Communications\b', # Communications companies r'\bTelevisora\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\b', # Mexican TV companies r'\bTelecomunicaciones\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\b' # Telecom companies ] for pattern in patterns: matches = re.findall(pattern, text) companies.update(matches) # Also look for specific known companies known_companies = ['Grupo Medcom', 'Televisa', 'TV Azteca', 'Grupo Salinas', 'Grupo Carso'] text_lower = text.lower() for company in known_companies: if company.lower() in text_lower: companies.add(company) return list(companies) # Initialize comprehensive search results search_data = { 'search_timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Find Telemundo 2006 Mexico expansion partnership with Mexico City company', 'search_queries': [], 'all_results': [], 'relevant_findings': [], 'companies_identified': set(), 'partnership_evidence': [], 'license_evidence': [], 'medcom_evidence': [] } # Define comprehensive search queries search_queries = [ "Telemundo Mexico expansion 2006 television project partnership", "Telemundo broadband license Mexico 2006 application", "Grupo Medcom Telemundo partnership news operations", "Noticiero Telemundo Internacional Mexico 2006 launch", "Telemundo Mexico City television company partnership 2006", "Telemundo Mexico broadcasting license 2006 telecommunications", "Grupo Medcom Mexico television news operations", "Telemundo international expansion Mexico partners 2006" ] # Keywords to identify relevant content relevant_keywords = [ 'Telemundo', 'Mexico', '2006', 'partnership', 'broadband', 'license', 'Grupo Medcom', 'Noticiero', 'Internacional', 'Mexico City', 'television', 'expansion', 'broadcasting', 'telecommunications', 'Gran Hotel', 'CINETOP', 'media company' ] # Perform searches using multiple search engines for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\n{'='*60}") print(f"SEARCH {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print(f"{'='*60}") search_data['search_queries'].append(query) # Try DuckDuckGo first ddg_results = search_duckduckgo(query, max_results=5) search_data['all_results'].extend(ddg_results) # Small delay between searches time.sleep(2) # Try Bing as backup bing_results = search_bing(query, max_results=5) search_data['all_results'].extend(bing_results) # Analyze results for relevant content all_query_results = ddg_results + bing_results for result in all_query_results: title = result.get('title', '') snippet = result.get('snippet', '') combined_text = f"{title} {snippet}" # Extract relevant sentences relevant_sentences = extract_relevant_content(combined_text, relevant_keywords) if relevant_sentences: relevant_finding = { 'query': query, 'title': title, 'link': result.get('link', ''), 'source': result.get('source', ''), 'relevant_content': relevant_sentences } search_data['relevant_findings'].append(relevant_finding) print(f"\n *** RELEVANT RESULT FOUND ***") print(f" Title: {title}") print(f" Relevant content:") for sentence in relevant_sentences[:3]: # Show first 3 relevant sentences print(f" - {sentence}") # Look for company names companies_found = analyze_for_companies(combined_text) search_data['companies_identified'].update(companies_found) # Categorize evidence combined_lower = combined_text.lower() if 'partnership' in combined_lower or 'partner' in combined_lower: search_data['partnership_evidence'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) if 'license' in combined_lower or 'broadband' in combined_lower: search_data['license_evidence'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) if 'medcom' in combined_lower: search_data['medcom_evidence'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) # Delay between different queries time.sleep(3) # Convert set to list for JSON serialization search_data['companies_identified'] = list(search_data['companies_identified']) # Generate comprehensive analysis print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH ANALYSIS") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"\nSEARCH STATISTICS:") print(f"- Total queries executed: {len(search_data['search_queries'])}") print(f"- Total results collected: {len(search_data['all_results'])}") print(f"- Relevant findings: {len(search_data['relevant_findings'])}") print(f"- Companies identified: {len(search_data['companies_identified'])}") print(f"- Partnership evidence: {len(search_data['partnership_evidence'])}") print(f"- License evidence: {len(search_data['license_evidence'])}") print(f"- Medcom evidence: {len(search_data['medcom_evidence'])}") if search_data['companies_identified']: print(f"\nCOMPANIES IDENTIFIED:") for company in sorted(search_data['companies_identified']): print(f" - {company}") if search_data['partnership_evidence']: print(f"\nPARTNERSHIP EVIDENCE:") for evidence in search_data['partnership_evidence'][:5]: # Show first 5 print(f" - {evidence['title']}") print(f" Query: {evidence['query']}") print(f" Content: {evidence['content'][:100]}{'...' if len(evidence['content']) > 100 else ''}") print() if search_data['medcom_evidence']: print(f"\nGRUPO MEDCOM EVIDENCE:") for evidence in search_data['medcom_evidence']: print(f" - {evidence['title']}") print(f" Content: {evidence['content'][:150]}{'...' if len(evidence['content']) > 150 else ''}") print() # Save comprehensive results results_file = 'workspace/telemundo_mexico_2006_comprehensive_search.json' with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(search_data, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nComprehensive search results saved to: {results_file}") # Create detailed summary report summary_file = 'workspace/telemundo_mexico_2006_analysis_summary.txt' with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("TELEMUNDO 2006 MEXICO EXPANSION - COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH ANALYSIS\n") f.write("=" * 70 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Search conducted: {search_data['search_timestamp']}\n") f.write(f"Objective: {search_data['objective']}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH OVERVIEW:\n") f.write(f"- Queries executed: {len(search_data['search_queries'])}\n") f.write(f"- Total results: {len(search_data['all_results'])}\n") f.write(f"- Relevant findings: {len(search_data['relevant_findings'])}\n") f.write(f"- Companies identified: {len(search_data['companies_identified'])}\n\n") if search_data['companies_identified']: f.write("COMPANIES IDENTIFIED FOR FURTHER INVESTIGATION:\n") for company in sorted(search_data['companies_identified']): f.write(f"- {company}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("KEY EVIDENCE CATEGORIES:\n") f.write(f"- Partnership mentions: {len(search_data['partnership_evidence'])}\n") f.write(f"- License/broadband mentions: {len(search_data['license_evidence'])}\n") f.write(f"- Grupo Medcom mentions: {len(search_data['medcom_evidence'])}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH QUERIES USED:\n") for i, query in enumerate(search_data['search_queries'], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {query}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("NEXT STEPS:\n") f.write("1. Investigate identified companies for connections to Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico\n") f.write("2. Research CINETOP ownership and operational connections\n") f.write("3. Look for corporate structure information on Grupo Medcom\n") f.write("4. Search for 2006 Mexican telecommunications licensing records\n") f.write("5. Investigate Mexico City hotel and media company cross-ownership\n") print(f"Analysis summary saved to: {summary_file}") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("SEARCH COMPLETION SUMMARY") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"Successfully executed {len(search_data['search_queries'])} search queries") print(f"Collected {len(search_data['all_results'])} total search results") print(f"Identified {len(search_data['relevant_findings'])} relevant findings") print(f"Found {len(search_data['companies_identified'])} potential companies") if 'Grupo Medcom' in search_data['companies_identified']: print(f"\n*** KEY FINDING: Grupo Medcom identified as potential partner ***") print(f"Next step: Research Grupo Medcom's connection to Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and CINETOP") else: print(f"\nContinue investigating identified companies for Mexico City connections") print(f"\nDetailed results available in:") print(f"- {results_file}") print(f"- {summary_file}")

Python Code python
# Fix the import scope issue by defining quote function globally import os import requests import json from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import time import re # Define quote function globally to avoid scope issues def url_quote(text): """Simple URL encoding function""" return text.replace(' ', '%20').replace('&', '%26').replace('#', '%23').replace('?', '%3F') # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) print("Searching for information about Telemundo's 2006 television expansion project in Mexico...") print("Focus: Partnership with Mexico City-based company, broadband license, Grupo Medcom, Noticiero Telemundo Internacional") print("="*80) def make_request_with_retry(url, max_retries=2, timeout=10): """Make HTTP request with basic retry logic""" headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36' } for attempt in range(max_retries): try: print(f" Making request (attempt {attempt + 1})...") response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=timeout) print(f" Status: {response.status_code}") if response.status_code == 200: return response else: print(f" HTTP error: {response.status_code}") except Exception as e: print(f" Request failed: {str(e)[:100]}") if attempt < max_retries - 1: time.sleep(2) return None def search_startpage(query): """Search using Startpage search engine""" print(f"\nSearching Startpage for: {query}") # Startpage search URL search_url = f"https://www.startpage.com/sp/search?query={url_quote(query)}" response = make_request_with_retry(search_url) results = [] if response: soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') # Look for search results in Startpage format search_results = soup.find_all('div', class_='w-gl__result') if not search_results: # Try alternative selectors search_results = soup.find_all('div', class_='result') for result in search_results[:8]: title_elem = result.find('a') snippet_elem = result.find('p') or result.find('span') if title_elem: title = title_elem.get_text(strip=True) link = title_elem.get('href', '') snippet = snippet_elem.get_text(strip=True) if snippet_elem else 'No description' if title and len(title) > 5: # Filter out very short titles results.append({ 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'source': 'Startpage' }) print(f" Found: {title[:70]}{'...' if len(title) > 70 else ''}") print(f" Results found: {len(results)}") return results def search_searx(query): """Search using SearX metasearch engine""" print(f"\nSearching SearX for: {query}") # Public SearX instance search_url = f"https://searx.be/search?q={url_quote(query)}&format=json" response = make_request_with_retry(search_url) results = [] if response: try: data = response.json() search_results = data.get('results', []) for result in search_results[:8]: title = result.get('title', '') link = result.get('url', '') snippet = result.get('content', 'No description') if title and len(title) > 5: results.append({ 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'source': 'SearX' }) print(f" Found: {title[:70]}{'...' if len(title) > 70 else ''}") except json.JSONDecodeError: print(" Failed to parse JSON response") print(f" Results found: {len(results)}") return results def extract_key_information(text, target_keywords): """Extract sentences containing key information""" if not text: return [] sentences = re.split(r'[.!?]+', text) relevant = [] for sentence in sentences: sentence = sentence.strip() if len(sentence) > 15: # Skip very short fragments sentence_lower = sentence.lower() if any(keyword.lower() in sentence_lower for keyword in target_keywords): relevant.append(sentence) return relevant def find_company_names(text): """Extract potential company names from text""" companies = set() if not text: return list(companies) # Mexican company patterns patterns = [ r'\bGrupo\s+[A-Z][a-zA-Z]+\b', r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\s+S\.A\.\s+de\s+C\.V\.\b', r'\bTelevisora\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\b', r'\bCorporaci√≥n\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\b', r'\bEmpresa\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\b' ] for pattern in patterns: matches = re.findall(pattern, text) companies.update(matches) # Known Mexican media companies known_companies = [ 'Grupo Medcom', 'Televisa', 'TV Azteca', 'Grupo Salinas', 'Grupo Carso', 'Grupo Imagen', 'MVS Comunicaciones' ] text_lower = text.lower() for company in known_companies: if company.lower() in text_lower: companies.add(company) return list(companies) # Initialize search data structure search_results = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Find Telemundo 2006 Mexico expansion partnership details', 'queries_executed': [], 'total_results': [], 'relevant_findings': [], 'companies_found': set(), 'partnership_mentions': [], 'license_mentions': [], 'medcom_mentions': [], 'mexico_city_mentions': [] } # Define targeted search queries search_queries = [ "Telemundo Mexico expansion 2006 partnership television", "Telemundo broadband license Mexico 2006", "Grupo Medcom Telemundo partnership Mexico", "Noticiero Telemundo Internacional Mexico 2006", "Telemundo Mexico City television company 2006", "Mexican television partnerships 2006 Telemundo" ] # Key terms for relevance filtering key_terms = [ 'Telemundo', 'Mexico', '2006', 'partnership', 'broadband', 'license', 'Grupo Medcom', 'Noticiero', 'Internacional', 'Mexico City', 'television', 'expansion', 'broadcasting', 'media company' ] # Execute searches for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\n{'='*60}") print(f"SEARCH {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print(f"{'='*60}") search_results['queries_executed'].append(query) # Try Startpage search startpage_results = search_startpage(query) search_results['total_results'].extend(startpage_results) time.sleep(2) # Brief pause between searches # Try SearX search searx_results = search_searx(query) search_results['total_results'].extend(searx_results) # Analyze results from this query all_query_results = startpage_results + searx_results for result in all_query_results: title = result.get('title', '') snippet = result.get('snippet', '') combined_text = f"{title} {snippet}" # Check for relevant content relevant_content = extract_key_information(combined_text, key_terms) if relevant_content: finding = { 'query': query, 'title': title, 'link': result.get('link', ''), 'source': result.get('source', ''), 'relevant_sentences': relevant_content } search_results['relevant_findings'].append(finding) print(f"\n *** RELEVANT RESULT ***") print(f" Title: {title}") print(f" Source: {result.get('source', 'Unknown')}") print(f" Key content:") for sentence in relevant_content[:2]: print(f" - {sentence[:100]}{'...' if len(sentence) > 100 else ''}") # Extract company names companies = find_company_names(combined_text) search_results['companies_found'].update(companies) # Categorize mentions text_lower = combined_text.lower() if 'partnership' in text_lower or 'partner' in text_lower: search_results['partnership_mentions'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) if 'license' in text_lower or 'broadband' in text_lower: search_results['license_mentions'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) if 'medcom' in text_lower: search_results['medcom_mentions'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) if 'mexico city' in text_lower: search_results['mexico_city_mentions'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) time.sleep(3) # Pause between different queries # Convert set to list for JSON serialization search_results['companies_found'] = list(search_results['companies_found']) # Analysis and summary print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("SEARCH ANALYSIS SUMMARY") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"\nSEARCH STATISTICS:") print(f"- Queries executed: {len(search_results['queries_executed'])}") print(f"- Total results collected: {len(search_results['total_results'])}") print(f"- Relevant findings: {len(search_results['relevant_findings'])}") print(f"- Companies identified: {len(search_results['companies_found'])}") print(f"- Partnership mentions: {len(search_results['partnership_mentions'])}") print(f"- License mentions: {len(search_results['license_mentions'])}") print(f"- Medcom mentions: {len(search_results['medcom_mentions'])}") print(f"- Mexico City mentions: {len(search_results['mexico_city_mentions'])}") if search_results['companies_found']: print(f"\nCOMPANIES IDENTIFIED:") for company in sorted(search_results['companies_found']): print(f" - {company}") if search_results['medcom_mentions']: print(f"\nGRUPO MEDCOM EVIDENCE:") for mention in search_results['medcom_mentions']: print(f" - {mention['title']}") print(f" Content: {mention['content'][:120]}{'...' if len(mention['content']) > 120 else ''}") print() if search_results['partnership_mentions']: print(f"\nPARTNERSHIP EVIDENCE:") for mention in search_results['partnership_mentions'][:3]: print(f" - {mention['title']}") print(f" Content: {mention['content'][:120]}{'...' if len(mention['content']) > 120 else ''}") print() # Save comprehensive results results_file = 'workspace/telemundo_2006_search_results.json' with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(search_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nDetailed search results saved to: {results_file}") # Create summary report summary_file = 'workspace/telemundo_2006_summary_report.txt' with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("TELEMUNDO 2006 MEXICO EXPANSION SEARCH REPORT\n") f.write("=" * 50 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Search Date: {search_results['timestamp']}\n") f.write(f"Objective: {search_results['objective']}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH OVERVIEW:\n") f.write(f"- Total queries: {len(search_results['queries_executed'])}\n") f.write(f"- Total results: {len(search_results['total_results'])}\n") f.write(f"- Relevant findings: {len(search_results['relevant_findings'])}\n") f.write(f"- Companies found: {len(search_results['companies_found'])}\n\n") if search_results['companies_found']: f.write("COMPANIES IDENTIFIED:\n") for company in sorted(search_results['companies_found']): f.write(f"- {company}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("EVIDENCE CATEGORIES:\n") f.write(f"- Partnership mentions: {len(search_results['partnership_mentions'])}\n") f.write(f"- License/broadband mentions: {len(search_results['license_mentions'])}\n") f.write(f"- Grupo Medcom mentions: {len(search_results['medcom_mentions'])}\n") f.write(f"- Mexico City mentions: {len(search_results['mexico_city_mentions'])}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH QUERIES USED:\n") for i, query in enumerate(search_results['queries_executed'], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {query}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("NEXT INVESTIGATION STEPS:\n") f.write("1. Research identified companies for Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico connections\n") f.write("2. Investigate CINETOP ownership and operational links\n") f.write("3. Look up corporate registrations for identified companies\n") f.write("4. Search for hotel and media company cross-ownership in Mexico City\n") print(f"Summary report saved to: {summary_file}") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("SEARCH COMPLETION STATUS") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"Successfully executed {len(search_results['queries_executed'])} search queries") print(f"Collected {len(search_results['total_results'])} search results") print(f"Identified {len(search_results['relevant_findings'])} relevant findings") print(f"Found {len(search_results['companies_found'])} potential companies") if 'Grupo Medcom' in search_results['companies_found']: print(f"\n*** KEY FINDING: Grupo Medcom identified ***") print(f"Priority: Investigate Grupo Medcom's connection to Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and CINETOP") else: print(f"\nContinue investigating other identified companies for Mexico City connections") print(f"\nSearch data available in:") print(f"- {results_file}") print(f"- {summary_file}")

Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - NameError: name 'url_quote' is not defined at line 50 in the search_startpage function. The code defines a url_quote function at the top (line 8-10) but there's a scope issue preventing the search functions from accessing it. The error occurred when trying to encode the first search query 'Telemundo Mexico expansion 2006 partnership television', preventing any search operations from running. **PLAN** alignment: 0% - no searches completed due to function scope issue. This is a recurring pattern from the **HISTORY** where similar import/scope issues have blocked execution multiple times. Recommended fix: Move the url_quote function definition inside each search function that uses it, or ensure it's properly accessible in the global scope by defining it before the search functions are defined. The function exists but isn't accessible when called from within the search_startpage function.
Python Code python
# Fix the import scope issue by defining quote function globally import os import requests import json from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import time import re # Define quote function globally to avoid scope issues def url_quote(text): """Simple URL encoding function""" return text.replace(' ', '%20').replace('&', '%26').replace('#', '%23').replace('?', '%3F') # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) print("Searching for information about Telemundo's 2006 television expansion project in Mexico...") print("Focus: Partnership with Mexico City-based company, broadband license, Grupo Medcom, Noticiero Telemundo Internacional") print("="*80) def make_request_with_retry(url, max_retries=2, timeout=10): """Make HTTP request with basic retry logic""" headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36' } for attempt in range(max_retries): try: print(f" Making request (attempt {attempt + 1})...") response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=timeout) print(f" Status: {response.status_code}") if response.status_code == 200: return response else: print(f" HTTP error: {response.status_code}") except Exception as e: print(f" Request failed: {str(e)[:100]}") if attempt < max_retries - 1: time.sleep(2) return None def search_startpage(query): """Search using Startpage search engine""" print(f"\nSearching Startpage for: {query}") # Startpage search URL search_url = f"https://www.startpage.com/sp/search?query={url_quote(query)}" response = make_request_with_retry(search_url) results = [] if response: soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') # Look for search results in Startpage format search_results = soup.find_all('div', class_='w-gl__result') if not search_results: # Try alternative selectors search_results = soup.find_all('div', class_='result') for result in search_results[:8]: title_elem = result.find('a') snippet_elem = result.find('p') or result.find('span') if title_elem: title = title_elem.get_text(strip=True) link = title_elem.get('href', '') snippet = snippet_elem.get_text(strip=True) if snippet_elem else 'No description' if title and len(title) > 5: # Filter out very short titles results.append({ 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'source': 'Startpage' }) print(f" Found: {title[:70]}{'...' if len(title) > 70 else ''}") print(f" Results found: {len(results)}") return results def search_searx(query): """Search using SearX metasearch engine""" print(f"\nSearching SearX for: {query}") # Public SearX instance search_url = f"https://searx.be/search?q={url_quote(query)}&format=json" response = make_request_with_retry(search_url) results = [] if response: try: data = response.json() search_results = data.get('results', []) for result in search_results[:8]: title = result.get('title', '') link = result.get('url', '') snippet = result.get('content', 'No description') if title and len(title) > 5: results.append({ 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'source': 'SearX' }) print(f" Found: {title[:70]}{'...' if len(title) > 70 else ''}") except json.JSONDecodeError: print(" Failed to parse JSON response") print(f" Results found: {len(results)}") return results def extract_key_information(text, target_keywords): """Extract sentences containing key information""" if not text: return [] sentences = re.split(r'[.!?]+', text) relevant = [] for sentence in sentences: sentence = sentence.strip() if len(sentence) > 15: # Skip very short fragments sentence_lower = sentence.lower() if any(keyword.lower() in sentence_lower for keyword in target_keywords): relevant.append(sentence) return relevant def find_company_names(text): """Extract potential company names from text""" companies = set() if not text: return list(companies) # Mexican company patterns patterns = [ r'\bGrupo\s+[A-Z][a-zA-Z]+\b', r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\s+S\.A\.\s+de\s+C\.V\.\b', r'\bTelevisora\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\b', r'\bCorporaci√≥n\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\b', r'\bEmpresa\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\b' ] for pattern in patterns: matches = re.findall(pattern, text) companies.update(matches) # Known Mexican media companies known_companies = [ 'Grupo Medcom', 'Televisa', 'TV Azteca', 'Grupo Salinas', 'Grupo Carso', 'Grupo Imagen', 'MVS Comunicaciones' ] text_lower = text.lower() for company in known_companies: if company.lower() in text_lower: companies.add(company) return list(companies) # Initialize search data structure search_results = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Find Telemundo 2006 Mexico expansion partnership details', 'queries_executed': [], 'total_results': [], 'relevant_findings': [], 'companies_found': set(), 'partnership_mentions': [], 'license_mentions': [], 'medcom_mentions': [], 'mexico_city_mentions': [] } # Define targeted search queries search_queries = [ "Telemundo Mexico expansion 2006 partnership television", "Telemundo broadband license Mexico 2006", "Grupo Medcom Telemundo partnership Mexico", "Noticiero Telemundo Internacional Mexico 2006", "Telemundo Mexico City television company 2006", "Mexican television partnerships 2006 Telemundo" ] # Key terms for relevance filtering key_terms = [ 'Telemundo', 'Mexico', '2006', 'partnership', 'broadband', 'license', 'Grupo Medcom', 'Noticiero', 'Internacional', 'Mexico City', 'television', 'expansion', 'broadcasting', 'media company' ] # Execute searches for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\n{'='*60}") print(f"SEARCH {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print(f"{'='*60}") search_results['queries_executed'].append(query) # Try Startpage search startpage_results = search_startpage(query) search_results['total_results'].extend(startpage_results) time.sleep(2) # Brief pause between searches # Try SearX search searx_results = search_searx(query) search_results['total_results'].extend(searx_results) # Analyze results from this query all_query_results = startpage_results + searx_results for result in all_query_results: title = result.get('title', '') snippet = result.get('snippet', '') combined_text = f"{title} {snippet}" # Check for relevant content relevant_content = extract_key_information(combined_text, key_terms) if relevant_content: finding = { 'query': query, 'title': title, 'link': result.get('link', ''), 'source': result.get('source', ''), 'relevant_sentences': relevant_content } search_results['relevant_findings'].append(finding) print(f"\n *** RELEVANT RESULT ***") print(f" Title: {title}") print(f" Source: {result.get('source', 'Unknown')}") print(f" Key content:") for sentence in relevant_content[:2]: print(f" - {sentence[:100]}{'...' if len(sentence) > 100 else ''}") # Extract company names companies = find_company_names(combined_text) search_results['companies_found'].update(companies) # Categorize mentions text_lower = combined_text.lower() if 'partnership' in text_lower or 'partner' in text_lower: search_results['partnership_mentions'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) if 'license' in text_lower or 'broadband' in text_lower: search_results['license_mentions'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) if 'medcom' in text_lower: search_results['medcom_mentions'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) if 'mexico city' in text_lower: search_results['mexico_city_mentions'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) time.sleep(3) # Pause between different queries # Convert set to list for JSON serialization search_results['companies_found'] = list(search_results['companies_found']) # Analysis and summary print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("SEARCH ANALYSIS SUMMARY") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"\nSEARCH STATISTICS:") print(f"- Queries executed: {len(search_results['queries_executed'])}") print(f"- Total results collected: {len(search_results['total_results'])}") print(f"- Relevant findings: {len(search_results['relevant_findings'])}") print(f"- Companies identified: {len(search_results['companies_found'])}") print(f"- Partnership mentions: {len(search_results['partnership_mentions'])}") print(f"- License mentions: {len(search_results['license_mentions'])}") print(f"- Medcom mentions: {len(search_results['medcom_mentions'])}") print(f"- Mexico City mentions: {len(search_results['mexico_city_mentions'])}") if search_results['companies_found']: print(f"\nCOMPANIES IDENTIFIED:") for company in sorted(search_results['companies_found']): print(f" - {company}") if search_results['medcom_mentions']: print(f"\nGRUPO MEDCOM EVIDENCE:") for mention in search_results['medcom_mentions']: print(f" - {mention['title']}") print(f" Content: {mention['content'][:120]}{'...' if len(mention['content']) > 120 else ''}") print() if search_results['partnership_mentions']: print(f"\nPARTNERSHIP EVIDENCE:") for mention in search_results['partnership_mentions'][:3]: print(f" - {mention['title']}") print(f" Content: {mention['content'][:120]}{'...' if len(mention['content']) > 120 else ''}") print() # Save comprehensive results results_file = 'workspace/telemundo_2006_search_results.json' with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(search_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nDetailed search results saved to: {results_file}") # Create summary report summary_file = 'workspace/telemundo_2006_summary_report.txt' with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("TELEMUNDO 2006 MEXICO EXPANSION SEARCH REPORT\n") f.write("=" * 50 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Search Date: {search_results['timestamp']}\n") f.write(f"Objective: {search_results['objective']}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH OVERVIEW:\n") f.write(f"- Total queries: {len(search_results['queries_executed'])}\n") f.write(f"- Total results: {len(search_results['total_results'])}\n") f.write(f"- Relevant findings: {len(search_results['relevant_findings'])}\n") f.write(f"- Companies found: {len(search_results['companies_found'])}\n\n") if search_results['companies_found']: f.write("COMPANIES IDENTIFIED:\n") for company in sorted(search_results['companies_found']): f.write(f"- {company}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("EVIDENCE CATEGORIES:\n") f.write(f"- Partnership mentions: {len(search_results['partnership_mentions'])}\n") f.write(f"- License/broadband mentions: {len(search_results['license_mentions'])}\n") f.write(f"- Grupo Medcom mentions: {len(search_results['medcom_mentions'])}\n") f.write(f"- Mexico City mentions: {len(search_results['mexico_city_mentions'])}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH QUERIES USED:\n") for i, query in enumerate(search_results['queries_executed'], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {query}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("NEXT INVESTIGATION STEPS:\n") f.write("1. Research identified companies for Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico connections\n") f.write("2. Investigate CINETOP ownership and operational links\n") f.write("3. Look up corporate registrations for identified companies\n") f.write("4. Search for hotel and media company cross-ownership in Mexico City\n") print(f"Summary report saved to: {summary_file}") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("SEARCH COMPLETION STATUS") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"Successfully executed {len(search_results['queries_executed'])} search queries") print(f"Collected {len(search_results['total_results'])} search results") print(f"Identified {len(search_results['relevant_findings'])} relevant findings") print(f"Found {len(search_results['companies_found'])} potential companies") if 'Grupo Medcom' in search_results['companies_found']: print(f"\n*** KEY FINDING: Grupo Medcom identified ***") print(f"Priority: Investigate Grupo Medcom's connection to Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and CINETOP") else: print(f"\nContinue investigating other identified companies for Mexico City connections") print(f"\nSearch data available in:") print(f"- {results_file}") print(f"- {summary_file}")

Python Code python
import os import requests import json from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import time import re # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) print("Searching for information about Telemundo's 2006 television expansion project in Mexico...") print("Focus: Partnership with Mexico City-based company, broadband license, Grupo Medcom, Noticiero Telemundo Internacional") print("="*80) def simple_url_encode(text): """Simple URL encoding without import dependencies""" # Basic URL encoding for spaces and common characters encoded = text.replace(' ', '+').replace('&', '%26').replace('#', '%23') return encoded def make_simple_request(url, timeout=10): """Make HTTP request with basic error handling""" headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36' } try: print(f" Requesting: {url[:80]}{'...' if len(url) > 80 else ''}") response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=timeout) print(f" Status: {response.status_code}") if response.status_code == 200: return response else: print(f" HTTP error: {response.status_code}") except Exception as e: print(f" Request failed: {str(e)[:100]}") return None def search_with_requests(query, search_engine='yandex'): """Search using different search engines with direct requests""" print(f"\nSearching {search_engine.title()} for: {query}") results = [] encoded_query = simple_url_encode(query) if search_engine == 'yandex': # Yandex search search_url = f"https://yandex.com/search/?text={encoded_query}&lr=213" response = make_simple_request(search_url) if response: soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') # Extract Yandex search results search_results = soup.find_all('div', class_='organic') for result in search_results[:6]: title_elem = result.find('h2') or result.find('a') snippet_elem = result.find('div', class_='text-container') or result.find('div', class_='snippet') if title_elem: title = title_elem.get_text(strip=True) link = title_elem.get('href', '') if title_elem.name == 'a' else '' snippet = snippet_elem.get_text(strip=True) if snippet_elem else 'No description' if title and len(title) > 10: results.append({ 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'source': 'Yandex' }) print(f" Found: {title[:60]}{'...' if len(title) > 60 else ''}") elif search_engine == 'baidu': # Baidu search (for alternative results) search_url = f"https://www.baidu.com/s?wd={encoded_query}" response = make_simple_request(search_url) if response: soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') # Extract Baidu search results search_results = soup.find_all('div', class_='result') for result in search_results[:6]: title_elem = result.find('h3') or result.find('a') snippet_elem = result.find('span', class_='content-right_8Zs40') if title_elem: title = title_elem.get_text(strip=True) link = title_elem.get('href', '') if title_elem.name == 'a' else '' snippet = snippet_elem.get_text(strip=True) if snippet_elem else 'No description' if title and len(title) > 10: results.append({ 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'source': 'Baidu' }) print(f" Found: {title[:60]}{'...' if len(title) > 60 else ''}") print(f" Total results: {len(results)}") return results def extract_relevant_sentences(text, keywords): """Extract sentences containing relevant keywords""" if not text: return [] sentences = re.split(r'[.!?]+', text) relevant = [] for sentence in sentences: sentence = sentence.strip() if len(sentence) > 20: # Skip very short fragments sentence_lower = sentence.lower() # Check if sentence contains multiple keywords or important ones keyword_count = sum(1 for keyword in keywords if keyword.lower() in sentence_lower) if keyword_count >= 2 or any(important in sentence_lower for important in ['telemundo', 'grupo medcom', 'mexico city']): relevant.append(sentence) return relevant def identify_companies(text): """Identify potential company names in text""" companies = set() if not text: return list(companies) # Look for Mexican company patterns company_patterns = [ r'\bGrupo\s+[A-Z][a-zA-Z]+\b', r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\s+S\.A\.\b', r'\bCorporaci√≥n\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\b', r'\bTelevisora\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\b' ] for pattern in company_patterns: matches = re.findall(pattern, text) companies.update(matches) # Check for known Mexican media companies known_companies = [ 'Grupo Medcom', 'Televisa', 'TV Azteca', 'Grupo Salinas', 'Grupo Carso', 'MVS Comunicaciones', 'Grupo Imagen' ] text_lower = text.lower() for company in known_companies: if company.lower() in text_lower: companies.add(company) return list(companies) # Initialize comprehensive search data search_data = { 'search_timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Find Telemundo 2006 Mexico expansion partnership with Mexico City company', 'search_queries': [], 'all_results': [], 'relevant_findings': [], 'companies_identified': set(), 'partnership_evidence': [], 'license_evidence': [], 'medcom_evidence': [], 'mexico_city_evidence': [] } # Define comprehensive search queries search_queries = [ "Telemundo Mexico expansion 2006 television partnership", "Telemundo broadband license Mexico 2006 application", "Grupo Medcom Telemundo partnership Mexico news", "Noticiero Telemundo Internacional Mexico 2006", "Telemundo Mexico City television company partnership", "Mexican television partnerships 2006 Telemundo broadcasting" ] # Keywords for relevance detection relevant_keywords = [ 'Telemundo', 'Mexico', '2006', 'partnership', 'broadband', 'license', 'Grupo Medcom', 'Noticiero', 'Internacional', 'Mexico City', 'television', 'expansion', 'broadcasting', 'media' ] # Execute searches using multiple search engines for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\n{'='*60}") print(f"SEARCH {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print(f"{'='*60}") search_data['search_queries'].append(query) # Try Yandex search first yandex_results = search_with_requests(query, 'yandex') search_data['all_results'].extend(yandex_results) time.sleep(3) # Pause between searches # Try Baidu search as alternative baidu_results = search_with_requests(query, 'baidu') search_data['all_results'].extend(baidu_results) # Analyze results from this query all_query_results = yandex_results + baidu_results for result in all_query_results: title = result.get('title', '') snippet = result.get('snippet', '') combined_text = f"{title} {snippet}" # Extract relevant content relevant_sentences = extract_relevant_sentences(combined_text, relevant_keywords) if relevant_sentences: finding = { 'query': query, 'title': title, 'link': result.get('link', ''), 'source': result.get('source', ''), 'relevant_content': relevant_sentences } search_data['relevant_findings'].append(finding) print(f"\n *** RELEVANT RESULT FOUND ***") print(f" Title: {title}") print(f" Source: {result.get('source', 'Unknown')}") print(f" Relevant content:") for sentence in relevant_sentences[:2]: print(f" - {sentence[:120]}{'...' if len(sentence) > 120 else ''}") # Identify companies companies = identify_companies(combined_text) search_data['companies_identified'].update(companies) # Categorize evidence types text_lower = combined_text.lower() if 'partnership' in text_lower or 'partner' in text_lower: search_data['partnership_evidence'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query, 'source': result.get('source', '') }) if 'license' in text_lower or 'broadband' in text_lower: search_data['license_evidence'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query, 'source': result.get('source', '') }) if 'medcom' in text_lower: search_data['medcom_evidence'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query, 'source': result.get('source', '') }) if 'mexico city' in text_lower: search_data['mexico_city_evidence'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query, 'source': result.get('source', '') }) time.sleep(4) # Longer pause between different queries # Convert set to list for JSON serialization search_data['companies_identified'] = list(search_data['companies_identified']) # Generate comprehensive analysis print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH ANALYSIS") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"\nSEARCH STATISTICS:") print(f"- Queries executed: {len(search_data['search_queries'])}") print(f"- Total results collected: {len(search_data['all_results'])}") print(f"- Relevant findings: {len(search_data['relevant_findings'])}") print(f"- Companies identified: {len(search_data['companies_identified'])}") print(f"- Partnership evidence: {len(search_data['partnership_evidence'])}") print(f"- License evidence: {len(search_data['license_evidence'])}") print(f"- Medcom evidence: {len(search_data['medcom_evidence'])}") print(f"- Mexico City evidence: {len(search_data['mexico_city_evidence'])}") if search_data['companies_identified']: print(f"\nCOMPANIES IDENTIFIED:") for company in sorted(search_data['companies_identified']): print(f" - {company}") if search_data['medcom_evidence']: print(f"\nGRUPO MEDCOM EVIDENCE:") for evidence in search_data['medcom_evidence']: print(f" - {evidence['title']}") print(f" Source: {evidence['source']}") print(f" Content: {evidence['content'][:100]}{'...' if len(evidence['content']) > 100 else ''}") print() if search_data['partnership_evidence']: print(f"\nPARTNERSHIP EVIDENCE:") for evidence in search_data['partnership_evidence'][:3]: print(f" - {evidence['title']}") print(f" Source: {evidence['source']}") print(f" Content: {evidence['content'][:100]}{'...' if len(evidence['content']) > 100 else ''}") print() if search_data['license_evidence']: print(f"\nLICENSE/BROADBAND EVIDENCE:") for evidence in search_data['license_evidence'][:2]: print(f" - {evidence['title']}") print(f" Source: {evidence['source']}") print(f" Content: {evidence['content'][:100]}{'...' if len(evidence['content']) > 100 else ''}") print() # Save comprehensive results results_file = 'workspace/telemundo_2006_mexico_search_results.json' with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(search_data, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nComprehensive search results saved to: {results_file}") # Create detailed summary report summary_file = 'workspace/telemundo_2006_mexico_summary.txt' with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("TELEMUNDO 2006 MEXICO EXPANSION - SEARCH ANALYSIS REPORT\n") f.write("=" * 60 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Search Date: {search_data['search_timestamp']}\n") f.write(f"Objective: {search_data['objective']}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH OVERVIEW:\n") f.write(f"- Queries executed: {len(search_data['search_queries'])}\n") f.write(f"- Total results: {len(search_data['all_results'])}\n") f.write(f"- Relevant findings: {len(search_data['relevant_findings'])}\n") f.write(f"- Companies identified: {len(search_data['companies_identified'])}\n\n") if search_data['companies_identified']: f.write("COMPANIES IDENTIFIED FOR INVESTIGATION:\n") for company in sorted(search_data['companies_identified']): f.write(f"- {company}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("EVIDENCE SUMMARY:\n") f.write(f"- Partnership mentions: {len(search_data['partnership_evidence'])}\n") f.write(f"- License/broadband mentions: {len(search_data['license_evidence'])}\n") f.write(f"- Grupo Medcom mentions: {len(search_data['medcom_evidence'])}\n") f.write(f"- Mexico City mentions: {len(search_data['mexico_city_evidence'])}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH QUERIES EXECUTED:\n") for i, query in enumerate(search_data['search_queries'], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {query}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("NEXT INVESTIGATION PRIORITIES:\n") f.write("1. Research identified companies for Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico connections\n") f.write("2. Investigate CINETOP ownership and operational relationships\n") f.write("3. Look up Mexican corporate registrations for identified companies\n") f.write("4. Search for hotel and media company cross-ownership patterns\n") f.write("5. Investigate Mexico City business directory for company connections\n") print(f"Summary report saved to: {summary_file}") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("SEARCH EXECUTION COMPLETE") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"Successfully executed {len(search_data['search_queries'])} search queries") print(f"Collected {len(search_data['all_results'])} total search results") print(f"Identified {len(search_data['relevant_findings'])} relevant findings") print(f"Found {len(search_data['companies_identified'])} potential companies") if 'Grupo Medcom' in search_data['companies_identified']: print(f"\n*** PRIORITY FINDING: Grupo Medcom identified as key partner ***") print(f"Next step: Research Grupo Medcom's connection to Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and CINETOP") else: print(f"\nContinue investigating identified companies for Mexico City hotel/media connections") print(f"\nSearch results and analysis available in:") print(f"- {results_file}") print(f"- {summary_file}")

Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - NameError: name 'simple_url_encode' is not defined at line 47 in the search_with_requests function. The code defines a simple_url_encode function at lines 33-36, but there's a scope issue preventing it from being accessible when called from within the search_with_requests function. The error occurred when trying to encode the first search query, preventing any search operations from running. **PLAN** alignment: 0% - no searches completed due to function scope issue. Looking at **HISTORY**, this is a recurring pattern where similar import/scope issues have repeatedly blocked execution across multiple attempts. Recommended fix: Define the URL encoding function inside each search function that uses it, or use Python's built-in string replacement methods directly in the search URL construction instead of calling a separate function. The persistent scope issues suggest the execution environment may have limitations with function accessibility across different scopes.
Python Code python
import os import requests import json from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import time import re # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) print("Searching for information about Telemundo's 2006 television expansion project in Mexico...") print("Focus: Partnership with Mexico City-based company, broadband license, Grupo Medcom, Noticiero Telemundo Internacional") print("="*80) def simple_url_encode(text): """Simple URL encoding without import dependencies""" # Basic URL encoding for spaces and common characters encoded = text.replace(' ', '+').replace('&', '%26').replace('#', '%23') return encoded def make_simple_request(url, timeout=10): """Make HTTP request with basic error handling""" headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36' } try: print(f" Requesting: {url[:80]}{'...' if len(url) > 80 else ''}") response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=timeout) print(f" Status: {response.status_code}") if response.status_code == 200: return response else: print(f" HTTP error: {response.status_code}") except Exception as e: print(f" Request failed: {str(e)[:100]}") return None def search_with_requests(query, search_engine='yandex'): """Search using different search engines with direct requests""" print(f"\nSearching {search_engine.title()} for: {query}") results = [] encoded_query = simple_url_encode(query) if search_engine == 'yandex': # Yandex search search_url = f"https://yandex.com/search/?text={encoded_query}&lr=213" response = make_simple_request(search_url) if response: soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') # Extract Yandex search results search_results = soup.find_all('div', class_='organic') for result in search_results[:6]: title_elem = result.find('h2') or result.find('a') snippet_elem = result.find('div', class_='text-container') or result.find('div', class_='snippet') if title_elem: title = title_elem.get_text(strip=True) link = title_elem.get('href', '') if title_elem.name == 'a' else '' snippet = snippet_elem.get_text(strip=True) if snippet_elem else 'No description' if title and len(title) > 10: results.append({ 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'source': 'Yandex' }) print(f" Found: {title[:60]}{'...' if len(title) > 60 else ''}") elif search_engine == 'baidu': # Baidu search (for alternative results) search_url = f"https://www.baidu.com/s?wd={encoded_query}" response = make_simple_request(search_url) if response: soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') # Extract Baidu search results search_results = soup.find_all('div', class_='result') for result in search_results[:6]: title_elem = result.find('h3') or result.find('a') snippet_elem = result.find('span', class_='content-right_8Zs40') if title_elem: title = title_elem.get_text(strip=True) link = title_elem.get('href', '') if title_elem.name == 'a' else '' snippet = snippet_elem.get_text(strip=True) if snippet_elem else 'No description' if title and len(title) > 10: results.append({ 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'source': 'Baidu' }) print(f" Found: {title[:60]}{'...' if len(title) > 60 else ''}") print(f" Total results: {len(results)}") return results def extract_relevant_sentences(text, keywords): """Extract sentences containing relevant keywords""" if not text: return [] sentences = re.split(r'[.!?]+', text) relevant = [] for sentence in sentences: sentence = sentence.strip() if len(sentence) > 20: # Skip very short fragments sentence_lower = sentence.lower() # Check if sentence contains multiple keywords or important ones keyword_count = sum(1 for keyword in keywords if keyword.lower() in sentence_lower) if keyword_count >= 2 or any(important in sentence_lower for important in ['telemundo', 'grupo medcom', 'mexico city']): relevant.append(sentence) return relevant def identify_companies(text): """Identify potential company names in text""" companies = set() if not text: return list(companies) # Look for Mexican company patterns company_patterns = [ r'\bGrupo\s+[A-Z][a-zA-Z]+\b', r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\s+S\.A\.\b', r'\bCorporaci√≥n\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\b', r'\bTelevisora\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\b' ] for pattern in company_patterns: matches = re.findall(pattern, text) companies.update(matches) # Check for known Mexican media companies known_companies = [ 'Grupo Medcom', 'Televisa', 'TV Azteca', 'Grupo Salinas', 'Grupo Carso', 'MVS Comunicaciones', 'Grupo Imagen' ] text_lower = text.lower() for company in known_companies: if company.lower() in text_lower: companies.add(company) return list(companies) # Initialize comprehensive search data search_data = { 'search_timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Find Telemundo 2006 Mexico expansion partnership with Mexico City company', 'search_queries': [], 'all_results': [], 'relevant_findings': [], 'companies_identified': set(), 'partnership_evidence': [], 'license_evidence': [], 'medcom_evidence': [], 'mexico_city_evidence': [] } # Define comprehensive search queries search_queries = [ "Telemundo Mexico expansion 2006 television partnership", "Telemundo broadband license Mexico 2006 application", "Grupo Medcom Telemundo partnership Mexico news", "Noticiero Telemundo Internacional Mexico 2006", "Telemundo Mexico City television company partnership", "Mexican television partnerships 2006 Telemundo broadcasting" ] # Keywords for relevance detection relevant_keywords = [ 'Telemundo', 'Mexico', '2006', 'partnership', 'broadband', 'license', 'Grupo Medcom', 'Noticiero', 'Internacional', 'Mexico City', 'television', 'expansion', 'broadcasting', 'media' ] # Execute searches using multiple search engines for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\n{'='*60}") print(f"SEARCH {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print(f"{'='*60}") search_data['search_queries'].append(query) # Try Yandex search first yandex_results = search_with_requests(query, 'yandex') search_data['all_results'].extend(yandex_results) time.sleep(3) # Pause between searches # Try Baidu search as alternative baidu_results = search_with_requests(query, 'baidu') search_data['all_results'].extend(baidu_results) # Analyze results from this query all_query_results = yandex_results + baidu_results for result in all_query_results: title = result.get('title', '') snippet = result.get('snippet', '') combined_text = f"{title} {snippet}" # Extract relevant content relevant_sentences = extract_relevant_sentences(combined_text, relevant_keywords) if relevant_sentences: finding = { 'query': query, 'title': title, 'link': result.get('link', ''), 'source': result.get('source', ''), 'relevant_content': relevant_sentences } search_data['relevant_findings'].append(finding) print(f"\n *** RELEVANT RESULT FOUND ***") print(f" Title: {title}") print(f" Source: {result.get('source', 'Unknown')}") print(f" Relevant content:") for sentence in relevant_sentences[:2]: print(f" - {sentence[:120]}{'...' if len(sentence) > 120 else ''}") # Identify companies companies = identify_companies(combined_text) search_data['companies_identified'].update(companies) # Categorize evidence types text_lower = combined_text.lower() if 'partnership' in text_lower or 'partner' in text_lower: search_data['partnership_evidence'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query, 'source': result.get('source', '') }) if 'license' in text_lower or 'broadband' in text_lower: search_data['license_evidence'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query, 'source': result.get('source', '') }) if 'medcom' in text_lower: search_data['medcom_evidence'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query, 'source': result.get('source', '') }) if 'mexico city' in text_lower: search_data['mexico_city_evidence'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query, 'source': result.get('source', '') }) time.sleep(4) # Longer pause between different queries # Convert set to list for JSON serialization search_data['companies_identified'] = list(search_data['companies_identified']) # Generate comprehensive analysis print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH ANALYSIS") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"\nSEARCH STATISTICS:") print(f"- Queries executed: {len(search_data['search_queries'])}") print(f"- Total results collected: {len(search_data['all_results'])}") print(f"- Relevant findings: {len(search_data['relevant_findings'])}") print(f"- Companies identified: {len(search_data['companies_identified'])}") print(f"- Partnership evidence: {len(search_data['partnership_evidence'])}") print(f"- License evidence: {len(search_data['license_evidence'])}") print(f"- Medcom evidence: {len(search_data['medcom_evidence'])}") print(f"- Mexico City evidence: {len(search_data['mexico_city_evidence'])}") if search_data['companies_identified']: print(f"\nCOMPANIES IDENTIFIED:") for company in sorted(search_data['companies_identified']): print(f" - {company}") if search_data['medcom_evidence']: print(f"\nGRUPO MEDCOM EVIDENCE:") for evidence in search_data['medcom_evidence']: print(f" - {evidence['title']}") print(f" Source: {evidence['source']}") print(f" Content: {evidence['content'][:100]}{'...' if len(evidence['content']) > 100 else ''}") print() if search_data['partnership_evidence']: print(f"\nPARTNERSHIP EVIDENCE:") for evidence in search_data['partnership_evidence'][:3]: print(f" - {evidence['title']}") print(f" Source: {evidence['source']}") print(f" Content: {evidence['content'][:100]}{'...' if len(evidence['content']) > 100 else ''}") print() if search_data['license_evidence']: print(f"\nLICENSE/BROADBAND EVIDENCE:") for evidence in search_data['license_evidence'][:2]: print(f" - {evidence['title']}") print(f" Source: {evidence['source']}") print(f" Content: {evidence['content'][:100]}{'...' if len(evidence['content']) > 100 else ''}") print() # Save comprehensive results results_file = 'workspace/telemundo_2006_mexico_search_results.json' with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(search_data, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nComprehensive search results saved to: {results_file}") # Create detailed summary report summary_file = 'workspace/telemundo_2006_mexico_summary.txt' with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("TELEMUNDO 2006 MEXICO EXPANSION - SEARCH ANALYSIS REPORT\n") f.write("=" * 60 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Search Date: {search_data['search_timestamp']}\n") f.write(f"Objective: {search_data['objective']}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH OVERVIEW:\n") f.write(f"- Queries executed: {len(search_data['search_queries'])}\n") f.write(f"- Total results: {len(search_data['all_results'])}\n") f.write(f"- Relevant findings: {len(search_data['relevant_findings'])}\n") f.write(f"- Companies identified: {len(search_data['companies_identified'])}\n\n") if search_data['companies_identified']: f.write("COMPANIES IDENTIFIED FOR INVESTIGATION:\n") for company in sorted(search_data['companies_identified']): f.write(f"- {company}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("EVIDENCE SUMMARY:\n") f.write(f"- Partnership mentions: {len(search_data['partnership_evidence'])}\n") f.write(f"- License/broadband mentions: {len(search_data['license_evidence'])}\n") f.write(f"- Grupo Medcom mentions: {len(search_data['medcom_evidence'])}\n") f.write(f"- Mexico City mentions: {len(search_data['mexico_city_evidence'])}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH QUERIES EXECUTED:\n") for i, query in enumerate(search_data['search_queries'], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {query}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("NEXT INVESTIGATION PRIORITIES:\n") f.write("1. Research identified companies for Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico connections\n") f.write("2. Investigate CINETOP ownership and operational relationships\n") f.write("3. Look up Mexican corporate registrations for identified companies\n") f.write("4. Search for hotel and media company cross-ownership patterns\n") f.write("5. Investigate Mexico City business directory for company connections\n") print(f"Summary report saved to: {summary_file}") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("SEARCH EXECUTION COMPLETE") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"Successfully executed {len(search_data['search_queries'])} search queries") print(f"Collected {len(search_data['all_results'])} total search results") print(f"Identified {len(search_data['relevant_findings'])} relevant findings") print(f"Found {len(search_data['companies_identified'])} potential companies") if 'Grupo Medcom' in search_data['companies_identified']: print(f"\n*** PRIORITY FINDING: Grupo Medcom identified as key partner ***") print(f"Next step: Research Grupo Medcom's connection to Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and CINETOP") else: print(f"\nContinue investigating identified companies for Mexico City hotel/media connections") print(f"\nSearch results and analysis available in:") print(f"- {results_file}") print(f"- {summary_file}")

Focus: Partnership with Mexico City-based company, broadband license, Grupo Medcom, Noticiero Telemundo Internacional ================================================================================ ============================================================ SEARCH 1/6: Telemundo Mexico expansion 2006 television partnership ============================================================ Searching Yandex for: Telemundo Mexico expansion 2006 television partnership Execution error: NameError: name 'simple_url_encode' is not defined Error/Warning: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/xushiyue.6/EvolAgent/src/utils/interpreter.py", line 367, in interpret_code exec(code, execution_globals, {}) # ‰ΩøÁî®Áã¨Á´ãÁöÑ locals ~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ File "<string>", line 201, in <module> File "<string>", line 47, in search_with_requests NameError: name 'simple_url_encode' is not defined

Code Execution - Plan #2 (Iteration 5)

Python Code python
import os import requests import json from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import time import re # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) print("Searching for information about Telemundo's 2006 television expansion project in Mexico...") print("Focus: Partnership with Mexico City-based company, broadband license, Grupo Medcom, Noticiero Telemundo Internacional") print("="*80) def search_with_direct_encoding(query, max_results=8): """Search using direct string replacement for URL encoding""" print(f"\nSearching for: {query}") # Direct URL encoding without function calls encoded_query = query.replace(' ', '+').replace('&', '%26').replace('#', '%23') results = [] # Try multiple search approaches search_urls = [ f"https://www.ecosia.org/search?q={encoded_query}", f"https://search.yahoo.com/search?p={encoded_query}" ] headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36', 'Accept': 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8', 'Accept-Language': 'en-US,en;q=0.5' } for search_url in search_urls: try: print(f" Trying: {search_url[:60]}...") response = requests.get(search_url, headers=headers, timeout=15) print(f" Status: {response.status_code}") if response.status_code == 200: soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') # Generic search result extraction potential_results = [] # Look for common search result patterns for selector in ['div.result', 'div.organic', 'div.algo', 'li.b_algo', 'div.g']: potential_results.extend(soup.select(selector)) # Also look for links and titles in various formats if not potential_results: potential_results = soup.find_all('div', class_=re.compile(r'result|search|organic')) for result in potential_results[:max_results]: # Extract title title_elem = result.find('h1') or result.find('h2') or result.find('h3') or result.find('a') # Extract snippet/description snippet_elem = result.find('p') or result.find('span') or result.find('div') if title_elem: title = title_elem.get_text(strip=True) link = title_elem.get('href', '') if title_elem.name == 'a' else '' snippet = snippet_elem.get_text(strip=True) if snippet_elem else 'No description' # Filter out very short or irrelevant titles if title and len(title) > 15 and not title.lower().startswith('search'): results.append({ 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'source': search_url.split('//')[1].split('/')[0] if '//' in search_url else 'Unknown' }) print(f" Found: {title[:70]}{'...' if len(title) > 70 else ''}") if results: break # If we got results, don't try other search engines except Exception as e: print(f" Search failed: {str(e)[:80]}") continue time.sleep(2) # Brief pause between different search engines print(f" Total results found: {len(results)}") return results def analyze_text_for_relevance(text, target_keywords): """Analyze text for relevant content""" if not text: return [], [] relevant_sentences = [] companies_found = [] # Split into sentences sentences = re.split(r'[.!?]+', text) for sentence in sentences: sentence = sentence.strip() if len(sentence) > 25: # Skip very short fragments sentence_lower = sentence.lower() # Check for relevance keyword_matches = [kw for kw in target_keywords if kw.lower() in sentence_lower] if len(keyword_matches) >= 2 or any(important in sentence_lower for important in ['telemundo', 'grupo medcom', 'mexico city']): relevant_sentences.append(sentence) # Look for company names text_lower = text.lower() # Mexican company patterns company_patterns = [ r'\bGrupo\s+[A-Z][a-zA-Z]+\b', r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\s+S\.A\.\b', r'\bCorporaci√≥n\s+[A-Z][a-z]+\b' ] for pattern in company_patterns: matches = re.findall(pattern, text) companies_found.extend(matches) # Known companies known_companies = ['Grupo Medcom', 'Televisa', 'TV Azteca', 'Grupo Salinas', 'Grupo Carso'] for company in known_companies: if company.lower() in text_lower: companies_found.append(company) return relevant_sentences, companies_found # Initialize search data search_data = { 'timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), 'objective': 'Find Telemundo 2006 Mexico expansion partnership with Mexico City company', 'queries': [], 'all_results': [], 'relevant_findings': [], 'companies_identified': [], 'evidence_categories': { 'partnership': [], 'license': [], 'medcom': [], 'mexico_city': [] } } # Define search queries search_queries = [ "Telemundo Mexico expansion 2006 television partnership", "Telemundo broadband license Mexico 2006", "Grupo Medcom Telemundo partnership Mexico", "Noticiero Telemundo Internacional Mexico 2006", "Telemundo Mexico City television company 2006" ] # Keywords for relevance detection relevant_keywords = [ 'Telemundo', 'Mexico', '2006', 'partnership', 'broadband', 'license', 'Grupo Medcom', 'Noticiero', 'Internacional', 'Mexico City', 'television', 'expansion', 'broadcasting' ] # Execute searches for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\n{'='*60}") print(f"SEARCH {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print(f"{'='*60}") search_data['queries'].append(query) # Perform search results = search_with_direct_encoding(query, max_results=6) search_data['all_results'].extend(results) # Analyze results for result in results: title = result.get('title', '') snippet = result.get('snippet', '') combined_text = f"{title} {snippet}" # Check for relevance relevant_sentences, companies = analyze_text_for_relevance(combined_text, relevant_keywords) if relevant_sentences or companies: finding = { 'query': query, 'title': title, 'link': result.get('link', ''), 'source': result.get('source', ''), 'relevant_content': relevant_sentences, 'companies_found': companies } search_data['relevant_findings'].append(finding) print(f"\n *** RELEVANT RESULT ***") print(f" Title: {title}") print(f" Source: {result.get('source', 'Unknown')}") if relevant_sentences: print(f" Relevant content:") for sentence in relevant_sentences[:2]: print(f" - {sentence[:100]}{'...' if len(sentence) > 100 else ''}") if companies: print(f" Companies found: {', '.join(companies)}") search_data['companies_identified'].extend(companies) # Categorize evidence text_lower = combined_text.lower() if 'partnership' in text_lower or 'partner' in text_lower: search_data['evidence_categories']['partnership'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) if 'license' in text_lower or 'broadband' in text_lower: search_data['evidence_categories']['license'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) if 'medcom' in text_lower: search_data['evidence_categories']['medcom'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) if 'mexico city' in text_lower: search_data['evidence_categories']['mexico_city'].append({ 'title': title, 'content': snippet, 'query': query }) time.sleep(5) # Pause between queries # Remove duplicates from companies search_data['companies_identified'] = list(set(search_data['companies_identified'])) # Generate analysis print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("SEARCH ANALYSIS RESULTS") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"\nSEARCH STATISTICS:") print(f"- Queries executed: {len(search_data['queries'])}") print(f"- Total results: {len(search_data['all_results'])}") print(f"- Relevant findings: {len(search_data['relevant_findings'])}") print(f"- Companies identified: {len(search_data['companies_identified'])}") for category, evidence in search_data['evidence_categories'].items(): print(f"- {category.title()} evidence: {len(evidence)}") if search_data['companies_identified']: print(f"\nCOMPANIES IDENTIFIED:") for company in sorted(search_data['companies_identified']): print(f" - {company}") if search_data['evidence_categories']['medcom']: print(f"\nGRUPO MEDCOM EVIDENCE:") for evidence in search_data['evidence_categories']['medcom']: print(f" - {evidence['title']}") print(f" Content: {evidence['content'][:100]}{'...' if len(evidence['content']) > 100 else ''}") print() if search_data['evidence_categories']['partnership']: print(f"\nPARTNERSHIP EVIDENCE:") for evidence in search_data['evidence_categories']['partnership'][:3]: print(f" - {evidence['title']}") print(f" Content: {evidence['content'][:100]}{'...' if len(evidence['content']) > 100 else ''}") print() # Save results results_file = 'workspace/telemundo_2006_search_final.json' with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(search_data, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nSearch results saved to: {results_file}") # Create summary summary_file = 'workspace/telemundo_2006_final_summary.txt' with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("TELEMUNDO 2006 MEXICO EXPANSION SEARCH - FINAL RESULTS\n") f.write("=" * 55 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Search Date: {search_data['timestamp']}\n") f.write(f"Objective: {search_data['objective']}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH SUMMARY:\n") f.write(f"- Queries: {len(search_data['queries'])}\n") f.write(f"- Results: {len(search_data['all_results'])}\n") f.write(f"- Relevant findings: {len(search_data['relevant_findings'])}\n") f.write(f"- Companies: {len(search_data['companies_identified'])}\n\n") if search_data['companies_identified']: f.write("COMPANIES FOR INVESTIGATION:\n") for company in sorted(search_data['companies_identified']): f.write(f"- {company}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("EVIDENCE SUMMARY:\n") for category, evidence in search_data['evidence_categories'].items(): f.write(f"- {category.title()}: {len(evidence)} mentions\n") f.write("\n") f.write("NEXT STEPS:\n") f.write("1. Investigate identified companies for Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico connections\n") f.write("2. Research CINETOP ownership and operational links\n") f.write("3. Look up corporate structures of identified companies\n") f.write("4. Search Mexico City business registrations\n") print(f"Summary saved to: {summary_file}") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("SEARCH EXECUTION COMPLETED") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"Successfully executed {len(search_data['queries'])} searches") print(f"Collected {len(search_data['all_results'])} results") print(f"Found {len(search_data['relevant_findings'])} relevant findings") print(f"Identified {len(search_data['companies_identified'])} companies") if 'Grupo Medcom' in search_data['companies_identified']: print(f"\n*** KEY FINDING: Grupo Medcom identified ***") print(f"Priority: Research Grupo Medcom's connection to Gran Hotel Ciudad de Mexico and CINETOP") else: print(f"\nNext: Investigate all identified companies for Mexico City connections") print(f"\nResults available in:") print(f"- {results_file}") print(f"- {summary_file}")
